meanings.definition: An herbal infusion or tea made from steeping various plants or herbs in hot water.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy sipping on tisanes before bedtime to help me relax.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother always brews tisanes when I visit her.
meanings.sent3: The tisanes my friend made tasted like a garden in a cup.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the tisanes filled the room with a soothing fragrance.
meanings.sent5: The tisanes were like a warm hug on a cold day.

meanings.definition: A medicinal drink made from herbs or plants, often used for their therapeutic properties.
meanings.sent1: Some people believe tisanes can help with minor ailments.
meanings.sent2: The tisanes my mom prepares always make me feel better when I'm sick.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the tisanes were like magic potions in a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: Her tisanes were like a healing elixir for the soul.
meanings.sent5: The tisanes worked wonders and eased my discomfort.
